channel.title: Projects on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Joost Plattel

item.title: Talent Acquisition Audit Institute
item.description:
With Bas van de Haterd and Champal Gijzen we started the Talent Acquisition Audit Institute (TA Audit for short). Our goal is to create bias-free recruitment processes by auditing companies and their talent acquisition.

An equal opportunity for everyone to find a job regardless of age, originethnicity or gender, that is our mission. We do this by conducting independent audits and awarding the Bias Free Hiring quality mark. There is a lot of attention to diversity and inclusion in the Recruitment and HR profession, and yet (un)conscious bias remains a major problem in selection processes. By providing insight into existing bias and its effect, we enable organizations to reduce bias and offer fair opportunities, resulting in the Bias-Free Hiring quality mark.

item.title: Obsidian Clipper
item.description: This is an unofficial clipper for Obsidian that allows you to easily clip a selection to a note in Obsidian. More information can be found on Github or in this blogpost.

item.title: DIY Longboard

item.title: De Padvinders
item.description:
My first real project that got a bit out of hand and developed in a business while I was a student. Together with 4 other friends I helped people with working smarter on their computer, basically doing as Seth Godin said:

Go find a geek. Someone who understands Gmail, Outlook, and other basic tools. Pay him to sit next to you for an hour and watch you work. Then say, ’tell me five ways I can save an hour a day.’ Whatever you need to pay for this service, it will pay for itself in a week. ~ Seth Godin

item.title: Mondriaantje

item.title: The Curious Corner of the Internet
item.description: A (almost) monthly newsletter stocked with the stuff I find on the corners of the internet!

item.title: Qount.us
item.description: How can we use personal data to improve the way we do our work? Qount.us was a dashboard collecting personal data with a goal to increase insights that might boost the quality of life surrounding work.
